item.title: Tomato Seedlings for sale
item.dc:creator: Pam Carlton
item.description:
Now that the weather is getting nice it is time to think about your summer garden. I have several varieties of organically grown tomato seedlings for sale. Some of the varieties include Black Krim, Cherokee Purple, Gold Medal and White…
Read more
item.content:encoded:
Now that the weather is getting nice it is time to think about your summer garden. I have several varieties of organically grown tomato seedlings for sale. Some of the varieties include Black Krim, Cherokee Purple, Gold Medal and White Cherry.

They are $3 per plant in 4″ pot or 4 for $10.Â  Email me pam@shantifarm.org if you are interested.

There will be more seedlings (peppers, eggplant, beans, cucumbers, basil) coming soon!
